snippet: Stock indexes declined for a third consecutive day after retailers in the United States issued weak earnings forecasts and more people filed unemployment claims.
abstract: Stock indexes decline for a third consecutive day after retailers in  the United States issued weak forecasts for earnings and more people filed claims for unemployment benefits.
lead_paragraph: Stock indexes declined for a third consecutive day after retailers in the United States issued weak earnings forecasts and more people filed unemployment claims.

headline.seo: Stock Indexes Fall on Weak Earnings Forecasts
headline.main: Shares Fall a 3rd Day on Weak Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall a 3rd Day on Weak Forecasts
